name: From atom to modern
description:
This is a scientific evolution resource management, click game. Manufacturing can be done with the simple click of a few buttons.

The main categories are
Atom
Hydrogen, helium, lithium, beryllium, boron, carbon, nitrogen, oxygen, fluorine, neon, etc. need to be unlocked in sequence, and the unlocking difficulty gradually increases, and the role of each atom will be displayed on the right side.

Molecules
Hydrogen, Oxygen, Ozone, Water, Carbon Dioxide, Calcium Carbonate, etc.

Early Earth
The hydrogen molecular cloud, the sun, the protoplanetary disk, the inner core, etc. are also unlocked in sequence according to the real situation we have learned so far.

Life
The earth is gradually evolving, and now life is starting to be born gradually unlocking oceans, amino acids, pyrimidines, purines, ribose, blue cells, humans, etc.

Stone Age
Gradually unlock wooden sticks, wooden spears, stone axes, etc., not to mention spoilers.

Ancient Civilization
Progressively unlock charcoal, blowers, early smelters, copper swords and more

Modern Civilization
Step by step to unlock nuclear weapons, rockets, gene editing, computers, artificial intelligence.

From making single atoms to making modern tools.
You can also unlock technology and upgrade the crafting process to increase production volume and production speed.
